quote: Normalness leads to sadness.
author: Phil Lester

quote: Sadness is never bad,"said Amparo. "Sadness is the mirror of being happy
author: Tim Willocks,  The Religion

quote: I will be stronger than my sadness.
author: Jasmine Warga,  My Heart and Other Black Holes

quote: It's a time of sorrow and sadness when we lose a loss of life.
author: George W. Bush

quote: I NEVER UNDERSTOOD THE POINT OF BEING SADWHEN I COULD CHOOSE TO BE HAPPY
author: Megan McCafferty,  Second Helpings

quote: There is no beauty in sadness. No honor in suffering. No growth in fear. No relief in hate. It’s just a waste of perfectly good happiness.
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quote: When your sad--like really sad--you only want to be with other people who are sad.
author: Nick Hornby,  A Long Way Down

quote: Live to the point of tears.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Why sadness was created?So we could rest from laughing.
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: I am both happy and sad at the same time, and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: What a sad story, I thought for so long. Not that I now think it was happy. But I think it is true, and thus the question of whether it is sad or happy has no meaning whatever.
author: Bernhard Schlink,  The Reader

quote: too much happiness always overflowed into tears of sorrow.
author: Amy Tan,  The Hundred Secret Senses

quote: When I get sad, I stop being sad and be awesome instead.
author: Barney Stinson

quote: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
author: Kahlil Gibran,  Sand and Foam

quote: Dying is only one thing to be sad over. Living unhappily is something else.
author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: Tears are words the heart can't express
author: Gerard Way

quote: Your hope is the most beautiful and the saddest in the world.
author: Naomi Benaron,  Running the Rift

quote: She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that’s important—you know
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I can see that the sadness has returned. And it's not a beautiful sadness- beautiful sadness is a myth. Sadness turns our features to clay, not porcelain.
author: David Levithan,  Every Day

quote: I want to be happy and sad at the same time. Yeah, I know it sounds sappy.
author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want Two apply for a job at our country's largest funeral home, and then wear a suit and noose to the job interview.

quote: Someday you're gonna look back on this moment of your life as such a sweet time of grieving. You'll see that you were in mourning and your heart was broken, but your life was changing...
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Crying in the Rain If you cry in the raindoes anybody but you know you're unhappy?
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.
author: Kareena Kapoor Khan

quote: So, this is my life. And I want you to know that I am both happy and sad and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: . . . owning a dog always ended with this sadness because dogs just don't live as long as people do.
author: John Grogan,  Marley and Me: Life and Love With the World's Worst Dog

quote: if it makes you happy, then why the hell are you so sad?
author: Sheryl Crow

quote: When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: Words are tears that have been written down. Tears are words that need to be shed. Without them, joy loses all its brilliance and sadness has no end.
author: Paulo Coelho,  Aleph

quote: Sometimes we love with nothing more than hope. Sometimes we cry with everything except tears.
author: Gregory David Roberts,  Shantaram

quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: The sad truth is the truth is sad.
author: Lemony Snicket,  The Hostile Hospital

quote: Life is both sad and solemn. We are led into a wonderful world, we meet one another here, greet each other - and wander together for a brief moment. Then we lose each other and disappear as suddenly and unreasonably as we arrived.
author: Jostein Gaarder,  Sophie's World

quote: Some feelings sink so deep into the heart that only loneliness can help you find them again. Some truths are so painful that only shame can help you live with them. Some things are so sad that only your soul can do the crying for them.
author: Gregory David Roberts,  Shantaram

quote: right in this moment, I can´t even remember what unhappy feels like.
author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Shiver

quote: I've cried, and you'd think I'd be better for it, but the sadness just sleeps, and it stays in my spine the rest of my life.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: We have such numerous interests in our lives that it is not uncommon, on a single occasion, for the foundations of a happiness that does not yet exist to be laid down alongside the intensification of a grief from which we are still suffering.
author: Marcel Proust,  Swann's Way

quote: There are two kinds of hope: the kind you couldn't do anything about and the kind you could. And even if the kind you could do something about wasn't what you'd originally wanted, it was still worth doing. A rainy day is better than no day. A small happiness can make a big sadness less sad.
author: Rachel Simon,  The Story of Beautiful Girl

quote: But hope, I can tell you, is an exhausting emotion; perhaps, along with fear, the most exhausting of all. It is like juggling eggs: the hope is the shell, and inside is despair. A single crack and the despair might spill everywhere, stain everything.
author: Sam Taylor

quote: My soul hurts.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: There's a sorrow and pain in everyone's life, but every now and then there's a ray of light that melts the loneliness in your heart and brings comfort like hot soup and a soft bed.
author: Hubert Selby Jr.,  Requiem for a Dream

quote: there are two types of people in the world: those who prefer to be sad among others, and those who prefer to be sad alone.
author: Nicole Krauss,  The History of Love

quote: Becoming hurts.
author: Kat Howard

quote: The saddest people I've ever met in life are the ones who don't care deeply about anything at all. Passion and satisfaction go hand in hand, and without them, any happiness is only temporary, because there's nothing to make it last.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John

quote: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
author: José N. Harris,  MI VIDA: A Story of Faith, Hope and Love

quote: What you must understand about me is that I’m a deeply unhappy person.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: [Children] just cannot be sad too long, it is not in them, as children mourn in little bits here and there like patchwork in their lives.
author: Nancy E. Turner,  These Is My Words: The Diary of Sarah Agnes Prine, 1881-1901

quote: Only those who still have hope can benefit from tears.
author: Nathanael West,  The Day of the Locust

quote: When you do something noble and beautiful and nobody noticed, do not be sad. For the sun every morning is a beautiful spectacle and yet most of the audience still sleeps.
author: John Lennon

quote: I cry, but not for myself. There’s too much sadness in this world to waste a moment with self-pity, when making others smile will also make me smile.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
